Name: Proxy Blade Zero
About the game: Proxy Blade Zero is a hardcore 3D action game with technical combat. Play as Fenrir, an advanced battle android, against the armies of King Anima. You will have to think fast to defeat the different enemies you will encounter. Parrying, using your boost and being creative with your combos are essential tools to your survival. Mastering Proxy Blade will require both your wits and reflexes. Be prepared! Do you have what it takes to stop Anima and his army of rogue machines?

Meta Description: Looking for information on Proxy Blade Zero? Check out the release date (Jul 28, 2014), developer insights from D6, and a complete game summary.
